seo.title: A B R Ahangama Beach Resort | Beachfront Hotel in Ahangama, Sri Lanka
seo.description: Experience paradise at A B R Ahangama Beach Resort. Steps from the beach Ahangama, Sri Lanka. Perfect for surfers and beach lovers.

hero.title: Welcome to A B R Ahangama Beach Resort
hero.subtitle: Your beachfront escape in Ahangama

about.title: About Us
about.description: Nestled along the beautiful coast of Ahangama, A B R Ahangama Beach Resort offers an unforgettable experience in Sri Lanka's southern coast. Whether you're here for world-class surf breaks or simply to unwind by the ocean, we provide the perfect blend of comfort and authentic Sri Lankan hospitality.

features.title: Beachfront Location
features.description: Steps away from pristine sandy beaches

features.title: Local Experience
features.description: Immerse yourself in authentic Sri Lankan culture and cuisine
